body: Park Management Plans       Management plans ensure park managers are guided by law, regulation, science and public input when ensuring the mission of the park is accomplished. The park's mission is governed by both the National Park Service Organic Act and the legislation that created Lake Mead National Recreation Area known as enabling legislation.         General Managment Plan Volume IVolume II (Part 1)Volume II (Part 2)Amendment         Lake Management Plan Volume IVolume II         Land Protection Plan Plan with Amendments         Foundation Document Foundation Document Overview
title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Park Management Plans
